name: Extra cheese burguer
description: Special veg burguer with Aallo Patty and cheese slice. Vegetable cabbage, tomato and onion. Sauces: Mayonnaise, tomato.

name: Classic chicken wings
description: Wings are served with your choice of blew cheese, ranch, or lite ranch dressing on the side.

name: Meatball sandwich
description: Three large green will classic meatballs with marinara sauce. Topped with mozzarolla and parmesan on a toasted sor dough hoagie.

name: Coconut chicken fingers
description: Chichen tenders with creole mustard mayo or plum sauce.

name: Hooters boneless chicken wings
description: Go boneless with easy to eat 100% breast meat. More chicken, less bone, lots of flavor.
